text: Shafi Ahmed is a Bangladeshi born British surgeon, teacher, innovator, and entrepreneur. He is also an advisor to Abu Dhabi Ministry of Health. ==Education== Ahmed did his schooling from Chadwell Heath Academy. He studied medicine at King's College Hospital School of Medicine from 1988 to 1993. ==References== Category:British businesspeople Category:Living people Category:People from Sylhet Division Category:1969 births
title: Shafi Ahmed
